summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating the installation, alteration, repair, maintenance and operation of refrigeration systems; prescribing certain fees for licenses, examinations and permits in connection therewith and amending Sections 2, 7, 13, 14, 18 and 22 of Ordinance No 80153, and adding thereto two new sections to be designated as Sections 3-A and 14-A; creating an Advisory Committee and exempting from the license and permit provisions the installation, alteration and repair of indirect refrigeration systems, respectively.
